title: ‘It Was a Stupid Instinct’: Pogačar, Evenepoel Twist Knife into Vingegaard in Tour de France Hilltop Tussle
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike vows to keep pressuring Pogačar all the way to Nice after Wednesday's offensive onslaught brings morale-sapping losses.

Read the full article at ‘It Was a Stupid Instinct’: Pogačar, Evenepoel Twist Knife into Vingegaard in Tour de France Hilltop Tussle on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
